table.title: Type-C AUX No Retimer Internal Cable Topology Notes

entry.p: No explicit limit, use best known routing practices.
Reference planes can be continuous ground or continuous power that have low frequency peak to peak noise. Ground referencing is preferred.
75 - 100 Ω including tolerance. Insertion loss ≥ -1.0 dB @ 1 MHz.
Refer to EMC chapter for parts recommendation. Optional.
Nominal 100 nF recommended (75 nF to 200 nF including tolerance).
AUX termination set based on USB Type-C plug orientation requirements. Nominal 3.3 V or 0 V.
An edge rate reduction mechanism such as a 47 pF capacitor (Cs) terminated to VSS is recommended to comply with DisplayPort maximum Aux slew rate specification.
